issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
Importing project from existing sources with checked option 'Copy project into workspace' should copy files into new workspace.
Works ok if project name is changed.

It doesn't copy the files and links to old location when project name is not changed from the original one (no matter if 'use imported project name' is checked or not).
fields.summary: Importing project without renaming it doesn't copy files to new workspace

comments.body:
I seem to be unable to reproduce this. I did the following:

# Created a mobile project outside the workspace from the CLI
# Went into studio, selected Import > Titanium Mobile Project
# Imported the project, selecting "copy into workspace"
# The project was copied

What did I miss?
